unnormalised: Personally, I love learning about the dedication and sacrifices these guys make. Reading about someone like Sachin Tendulkar's journey from a young boy in Mumbai to the "God of Cricket" is incredibly inspiring. His discipline, the way he handled pressure – it’s all fascinating. I was just reading about his childhood training at Shivaji Park, and it made me think about my own passion for sports growing up.

unnormalised: I especially enjoy when the biography delves into the cultural context too.
